name: Cards and Castles 2
summary:
Cards and Castles 2 is a free, competitive, unique, and fair collectible card meets tactics game. It is the sequel to the 2 million downloaded multiple platform (Steam, IOS, Google Play) Cards and Castles.

Collect cards, build decks, and compete against other players in strategic tactical battles.

Position your units on the battlefield and destroy the enemy Castle to claim victory in strategic turn-based combat.
Construct a deck from hundreds of unique cards - use minions, spells, and buildings to discover new strategies and devastating combos.
Choose from seven unique factions: Vikings, Crusaders, Pirates, Ninjas, Druids, Warlocks, and Necromancers.
